::DarkMouse::

She looked at Inferno. "Would you please tell me what is going on? 
You said that Megatronis dead? How is that passable? Where did he 
die? How was he killed?" She looked at him with a slight hint of fear 
in her eyes.  If someone killed the mighty Megatron, then that means 
that there is a greater, more powerful bot now on the planet.  That 
thought made her spine shiver a little. "Tell me who killed Megatron? 
please."
